pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, November 18, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

6:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual discussion with members of the Filipino-Canadian community from Winnipeg, hosted by Member of Parliament for Winnipeg North Kevin Lamoureux. Minister of Northern Affairs Dan Vandal, Member of Parliament for Winnipeg South Centre Jim Carr, and Member of Parliament for Winnipeg South Terry Duguid will also be in attendance. 

Closed to media.

Media appearance

8:15 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Winnipeg’s 92.1 CITI.
